column4: I'm having some trouble burning a data DVD with my compaq laptop's internal burner in 9.04. I have tried GnomeBaker and Brasero. any ideas?
if you don't mind installing kdelibs try out k3b - it works very well for me
i think it will suit your needs ;)
just opened K3b and started the burn...looks like it's started correctly so far: write speed and 2% progress :) thanks again
